about_the_game:
・The unknown world that rules the universe
Exploring unknown worlds that humans cannot go to leads to joy and a sense of accomplishment.
An overwhelming threat never seen before awaits players.

・Controls and operations
Left: Attack
Right: Move
Skill: QWERDF
Weapon Change: 123
space: guard
Potion: F1~F4
(If you hit the head, a headshot is applied.)

・Post-apocalyptic
This is a story about humans gaining power from light and fighting against void life forms in order to prevent the end of the Earth.
You start out as a human and explore infected areas on Earth. Furthermore, the story unfolds of gaining transcendent power (awakening), crossing time, and colliding with the void.

・Game type
Clearing the game requires aiming ability, kiting, and instantaneous reaction speed.
Endgame is a game where you clear the game by controlling and identifying enemies (skills appropriate for the situation) rather than continuously hunting to become stronger.

・Detailed story
In the beginning, before life was born in the universe, light and darkness existed.
The light spread brightly throughout the universe, and a void was created in the dark void that the light could not fill.
The void spread as fast as light, and a major collision occurred between light and void.
The massive energy resulting from the collision created another world in light and void, and spread throughout the universe, creating numerous stars, planets, and life forms.

As endless time passes, about 5 billion years ago, a planet called Earth was about to be created.
In the beginning, void life forms came to turn the Earth into a void, and to prevent this, light opposed the void.

New York city and 5-dimensional space in 2030. (Tesseract)
Humans end up in the Tesseract by chance. After learning about what happened in the past, he longs for the power to fight the void...

name: EndGame

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 60" is guaranteed and selected under the graphic settings by default when the game is launched for the first time.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-Bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 80" is guaranteed and selected under the graphic settings by default when the game is launched for the first time.

short_description: The world's most difficult speedrunning game A control RPG game, travel across time and explore places humans cannot go. 200 monsters, 35 backgrounds, 600 total skills (including monsters)
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Norwegian, Russian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Swedish, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Finnish, Korean, Hungarian
